mapper.sql: KSXCGL_ID, KCGL_ID, KSXCGL_NAME, KSXCGL_IDCARD, KSXCGL_BKDW, KSXCGL_KKSLX, KSXCGL_WJQK, KSXCGL_TSZG, KSXCGL_KSCJ_GLG, KSXCGL_KSCJ_JSG, KSXCGL_YCSJ, KSXCGL_ADDTIME, KSXCGL_DELFLAG,KSXCGL_KC,KSXCGL_KSCJ_YYCJ,KSXCGL_BMGL_ID,KSXCGL_JSG_YYCJ
mapper.select:
select count(*) from KSXCGL where KSXCGL_DELFLAG=1
and KSXCGL_NAME like '%${ksxcglName}%'
and KSXCGL_IDCARD like '%${ksxcglIdcard}%'
and KSXCGL_BKDW like '%${ksxcglBkdw}%'
and KSXCGL_KKSLX like '%${ksxcglKkslx}%'
and KSXCGL_KC like '%${ksxcglKc}%'

select KSXCGL_ID, KCGL_ID, KSXCGL_NAME, KSXCGL_IDCARD, KSXCGL_BKDW, KSXCGL_KKSLX, KSXCGL_WJQK,KSXCGL_BMGL_ID,KSXCGL_JSG_YYCJ, KSXCGL_TSZG, KSXCGL_KSCJ_GLG, KSXCGL_KSCJ_JSG, KSXCGL_YCSJ, KSXCGL_ADDTIME, KSXCGL_DELFLAG,KSXCGL_KC, KSXCGL_KSCJ_YYCJ,(select ZZJG_DWDM FROM ZZJG WHERE ZZJG_DWMC = KSXCGL_BKDW) DWDM, (KSXCGL_KSCJ_GLG+KSXCGL_KSCJ_YYCJ) glgcj,(KSXCGL_KSCJ_JSG+KSXCGL_KSCJ_YYCJ) jsgcj from (select top ${currentPageSize} * from (select top(${pageNum}*${pageSize}) * from KSXCGL T where KSXCGL_DELFLAG=1
and KSXCGL_NAME like '%${ksxcglName}%'
and KSXCGL_IDCARD like '%${ksxcglIdcard}%'
and KSXCGL_BKDW like '%${ksxcglBkdw}%'
and KSXCGL_KKSLX like '%${ksxcglKkslx}%'
and KSXCGL_KC like '%${ksxcglKc}%'
order by T.KSXCGL_ID desc ) as t1 order by KSXCGL_ID asc) as t2 order by KSXCGL_ID desc
mapper.delete: update JTJLK set JTJLK_CPJG = '未测评', JTJLK_CPCJ = '未完成' WHERE JTJLK_USERID = (SELECT USER_ID FROM USERINFO WHERE USER_SFZH = (select KSXCGL_IDCARD from KSXCGL where KSXCGL_ID = #{ksxcglId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})); delete from KSXCGL where KSXCGL_ID = #{ksxcglId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}; delete from BMGL where BMGL_ID = #{bmglId,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
mapper.insert: insert into KSXCGL (KSXCGL_ID, KCGL_ID, KSXCGL_NAME, KSXCGL_IDCARD, KSXCGL_BKDW, KSXCGL_KKSLX, KSXCGL_WJQK, KSXCGL_TSZG, KSXCGL_KSCJ_GLG,KSXCGL_JSG_YYCJ, KSXCGL_KSCJ_JSG, KSXCGL_YCSJ, KSXCGL_ADDTIME, KSXCGL_DELFLAG, KSXCGL_XGCSBG,KSXCGL_KC,KSXCGL_KSCJ_YYCJ,KSXCGL_BMGL_ID) values (#{ksxcglId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kcglId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ksxcglName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ksxcglIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ksxcglBkdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ksxcglKkslx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ksxcglWjqk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ksxcglTszg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ksxcglKscjGlg,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{ksxcglJsgYycj,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{ksxcglKscjJsg,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{ksxcglYcsj,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{ksxcglAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ksxcglDelflag,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{ksxcglXgcsbg,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},#{ksxcglKc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ksxcglKscjYycj,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{ksxcglBmglId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update KSXCGL
KCGL_ID = #{kcglId,jdbcType=CHAR},

update KSXCGL set KCGL_ID = #{kcglId,jdbcType=CHAR}, KSXCGL_NAME = #{ksxcglName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KSXCGL_IDCARD = #{ksxcglIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KSXCGL_BKDW = #{ksxcglBkdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KSXCGL_KKSLX = #{ksxcglKkslx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KSXCGL_WJQK = #{ksxcglWjqk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KSXCGL_TSZG = #{ksxcglTszg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KSXCGL_KSCJ_GLG = #{ksxcglKscjGlg,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, KSXCGL_KSCJ_JSG = #{ksxcglKscjJsg,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, KSXCGL_YCSJ = #{ksxcglYcsj,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, KSXCGL_ADDTIME = #{ksxcglAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, KSXCGL_DELFLAG = #{ksxcglDelflag,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, KSXCGL_XGCSBG = #{ksxcglXgcsbg,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, KSXCGL_KC = #{ksxcglKc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KSXCGL_KSCJ_YYCJ = #{ksxcglKscjYycj,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, KSXCGL_BMGL_ID = #{ksxcglBmglId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KSXCGL_JSG_YYCJ = #{ksxcglJsgYycj,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, where KSXCGL_ID = #{ksxcglId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update KSXCGL set KCGL_ID = #{kcglId,jdbcType=CHAR}, KSXCGL_NAME = #{ksxcglName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KSXCGL_IDCARD = #{ksxcglIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KSXCGL_BKDW = #{ksxcglBkdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KSXCGL_KKSLX = #{ksxcglKkslx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KSXCGL_WJQK = #{ksxcglWjqk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KSXCGL_TSZG = #{ksxcglTszg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KSXCGL_KSCJ_GLG = #{ksxcglKscjGlg,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, KSXCGL_KSCJ_JSG = #{ksxcglKscjJsg,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, KSXCGL_YCSJ = #{ksxcglYcsj,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, KSXCGL_ADDTIME = #{ksxcglAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, KSXCGL_DELFLAG = #{ksxcglDelflag,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, KSXCGL_KC = #{ksxcglKc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KSXCGL_KSCJ_YYCJ = #{ksxcglKscjYycj,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, KSXCGL_BMGL_ID = #{ksxcglBmglId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KSXCGL_JSG_YYCJ = #{ksxcglJsgYycj,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, where KSXCGL_ID = #{ksxcglId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(*) from KSXCGL where KCGL_ID = #{ksxcglKc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
update KSXCGL
KCGL_ID = #{kcglId,jdbcType=CHAR},
KSXCGL_NAME = #{ksxcglName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KSXCGL_IDCARD = #{ksxcglIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KSXCGL_BKDW = #{ksxcglBkdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KSXCGL_KKSLX = #{ksxcglKkslx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KSXCGL_WJQK = #{ksxcglWjqk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KSXCGL_TSZG = #{ksxcglTszg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KSXCGL_KSCJ_GLG = #{ksxcglKscjGlg,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
KSXCGL_KSCJ_JSG = #{ksxcglKscjJsg,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
KSXCGL_YCSJ = #{ksxcglYcsj,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
KSXCGL_ADDTIME = #{ksxcglAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
KSXCGL_DELFLAG = #{ksxcglDelflag,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
KSXCGL_XGCSBG = #{ksxcglXgcsbg,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
KSXCGL_KC = #{ksxcglKc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KSXCGL_KSCJ_YYCJ = #{ksxcglKscjYycj,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
KSXCGL_BMGL_ID = #{ksxcglBmglId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
KSXCGL_JSG_YYCJ = #{ksxcglJsgYycj,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
where KSXCGL_NAME = #{ksxcglName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and KSXCGL_BKDW = #{ksxcglBkdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT KSXCGL_ID, KCGL_ID, KSXCGL_NAME, KSXCGL_IDCARD, KSXCGL_BKDW, KSXCGL_KKSLX, KSXCGL_WJQK, KSXCGL_BMGL_ID, KSXCGL_JSG_YYCJ, KSXCGL_TSZG, KSXCGL_KSCJ_GLG, KSXCGL_KSCJ_JSG, KSXCGL_YCSJ, KSXCGL_ADDTIME, KSXCGL_DELFLAG, KSXCGL_KC, KSXCGL_KSCJ_YYCJ, (select ZZJG_DWDM FROM ZZJG WHERE ZZJG_DWMC = KSXCGL_BKDW) DWDM, (KSXCGL_KSCJ_GLG + KSXCGL_KSCJ_YYCJ) glgcj, (KSXCGL_KSCJ_JSG + KSXCGL_JSG_YYCJ) jsgcj, R.RESUME_SEX sex, R.RESUME_BIRTHDAY birthday, R.RESUME_ID, (select kc.KCGL_NAME from KCGL kc where kc.KCGL_ID = K.KCGL_ID) kcname, (Select CONVERT(VARCHAR(100), KSXCGL_ADDTIME, 20)) kssj, (select top 1 RESUME_XXMC from RESUME_JYJL rj where rj.RESUME_ID = R.RESUME_ID) byyx, (select top 1 RESUME_ZYL from RESUME_JYJL rj where rj.RESUME_ID = R.RESUME_ID) zyl, (select top 1 RESUME_XL from RESUME_JYJL rj where rj.RESUME_ID = R.RESUME_ID) xl FROM KSXCGL K LEFT JOIN RESUME R ON R.RESUME_SFZH = K.KSXCGL_IDCARD where KSXCGL_KSCJ_GLG >=0 or KSXCGL_KSCJ_JSG >=0

select count(*) from KSXCGL where KSXCGL_DELFLAG=1 and (KSXCGL_KSCJ_GLG >=0 or KSXCGL_KSCJ_JSG >=0)
and KSXCGL_NAME like '%${ksxcglName}%'
and KSXCGL_IDCARD like '%${ksxcglIdcard}%'
and KSXCGL_BKDW like '%${ksxcglBkdw}%'
and KSXCGL_KKSLX like '%${ksxcglKkslx}%'
and KSXCGL_KC like '%${ksxcglKc}%'

select KSXCGL_ID, KCGL_ID, KSXCGL_NAME, KSXCGL_IDCARD, KSXCGL_BKDW, KSXCGL_KKSLX, KSXCGL_WJQK,KSXCGL_BMGL_ID,KSXCGL_JSG_YYCJ, KSXCGL_TSZG, KSXCGL_KSCJ_GLG, KSXCGL_KSCJ_JSG, KSXCGL_YCSJ, KSXCGL_ADDTIME, KSXCGL_DELFLAG,KSXCGL_KC, KSXCGL_KSCJ_YYCJ,(select ZZJG_DWDM FROM ZZJG WHERE ZZJG_DWMC = KSXCGL_BKDW) DWDM, (KSXCGL_KSCJ_GLG+KSXCGL_KSCJ_YYCJ) glgcj,(KSXCGL_KSCJ_JSG+KSXCGL_JSG_YYCJ) jsgcj, (select RESUME_SEX from RESUME where RESUME_SFZH = KSXCGL_IDCARD) sex, (select RESUME_BIRTHDAY from RESUME where RESUME_SFZH = KSXCGL_IDCARD) birthday, (select kc.KCGL_NAME from KCGL kc where kc.KCGL_ID = t2.KCGL_ID) kcname, (Select CONVERT(VARCHAR(100), KSXCGL_ADDTIME, 20) ) kssj, (select top 1 RESUME_XXMC from RESUME_JYJL rj where rj.RESUME_ID = (select re.RESUME_ID from RESUME re where re.RESUME_SFZH = KSXCGL_IDCARD)) byyx, (select top 1 RESUME_ZYL from RESUME_JYJL rj where rj.RESUME_ID = (select re.RESUME_ID from RESUME re where re.RESUME_SFZH = KSXCGL_IDCARD)) zyl, (select top 1 RESUME_XL from RESUME_JYJL rj where rj.RESUME_ID = (select re.RESUME_ID from RESUME re where re.RESUME_SFZH = KSXCGL_IDCARD)) xl from (select top ${currentPageSize} * from (select top(${pageNum}*${pageSize}) * from KSXCGL T where KSXCGL_DELFLAG=1 and (KSXCGL_KSCJ_GLG >=0 or KSXCGL_KSCJ_JSG >=0)
and KSXCGL_NAME like '%${ksxcglName}%'
and KSXCGL_IDCARD like '%${ksxcglIdcard}%'
and KSXCGL_BKDW like '%${ksxcglBkdw}%'
and KSXCGL_KKSLX like '%${ksxcglKkslx}%'
and KSXCGL_KC like '%${ksxcglKc}%'
order by T.KSXCGL_ADDTIME desc ) as t1 order by KSXCGL_ADDTIME asc) as t2 order by KSXCGL_ADDTIME desc
mapper.update: update KSXCGL set KSXCGL_KSCJ_JSG = NULL WHERE KSXCGL_ID = #{ksxcglId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}; delete from BMGL where BMGL_BKGW = '技术岗' and BMGL_ID = (select KSXCGL_BMGL_ID from KSXCGL where KSXCGL_ID = #{ksxcglId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}); update JTJLK set JTJLK_CPJG = '未测评', JTJLK_CPCJ = '未完成' WHERE JTJLK_APCPGWLB = '技术岗' and JTJLK_USERID = (SELECT USER_ID FROM USERINFO WHERE USER_SFZH = (select KSXCGL_IDCARD from KSXCGL where KSXCGL_ID = #{ksxcglId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}))

update KSXCGL set KSXCGL_KSCJ_GLG = NULL WHERE KSXCGL_ID = #{ksxcglId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}; delete from BMGL where BMGL_BKGW = '管理岗' and BMGL_ID = (select KSXCGL_BMGL_ID from KSXCGL where KSXCGL_ID = #{ksxcglId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}); update JTJLK set JTJLK_CPJG = '未测评', JTJLK_CPCJ = '未完成' WHERE JTJLK_APCPGWLB = '管理岗' and JTJLK_USERID = (SELECT USER_ID FROM USERINFO WHERE USER_SFZH = (select KSXCGL_IDCARD from KSXCGL where KSXCGL_ID = #{ksxcglId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}))
mapper.select:
select count(*) from KSXCGL where KSXCGL_DELFLAG=1 and (KSXCGL_KSCJ_GLG >=0 or KSXCGL_KSCJ_JSG >=0)
and KSXCGL_BKDW in (select ZZJG_DWMC from ZZJG where ZZJG_ID = #{zzjgDwdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or ZZJG_SJDW = #{zzjgDwdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and KSXCGL_NAME like '%${ksxcglName}%'
and KSXCGL_IDCARD like '%${ksxcglIdcard}%'
and KSXCGL_BKDW like '%${ksxcglBkdw}%'
and KSXCGL_KKSLX like '%${ksxcglKkslx}%'
and KSXCGL_KC like '%${ksxcglKc}%'

select KSXCGL_ID, KCGL_ID, KSXCGL_NAME, KSXCGL_IDCARD, KSXCGL_BKDW, KSXCGL_KKSLX, KSXCGL_WJQK,KSXCGL_BMGL_ID,KSXCGL_JSG_YYCJ, KSXCGL_TSZG, KSXCGL_KSCJ_GLG, KSXCGL_KSCJ_JSG, KSXCGL_YCSJ, KSXCGL_ADDTIME, KSXCGL_DELFLAG,KSXCGL_KC, KSXCGL_KSCJ_YYCJ,(select ZZJG_DWDM FROM ZZJG WHERE ZZJG_DWMC = KSXCGL_BKDW) DWDM, (KSXCGL_KSCJ_GLG+KSXCGL_KSCJ_YYCJ) glgcj,(KSXCGL_KSCJ_JSG+KSXCGL_JSG_YYCJ) jsgcj, (select RESUME_SEX from RESUME where RESUME_SFZH = KSXCGL_IDCARD) sex, (select RESUME_BIRTHDAY from RESUME where RESUME_SFZH = KSXCGL_IDCARD) birthday, (select kc.KCGL_NAME from KCGL kc where kc.KCGL_ID = t2.KCGL_ID) kcname, (Select CONVERT(VARCHAR(100), KSXCGL_ADDTIME, 20) ) kssj, (select top 1 RESUME_XXMC from RESUME_JYJL rj where rj.RESUME_ID = (select re.RESUME_ID from RESUME re where re.RESUME_SFZH = KSXCGL_IDCARD)) byyx, (select top 1 RESUME_ZYL from RESUME_JYJL rj where rj.RESUME_ID = (select re.RESUME_ID from RESUME re where re.RESUME_SFZH = KSXCGL_IDCARD)) zyl, (select top 1 RESUME_XL from RESUME_JYJL rj where rj.RESUME_ID = (select re.RESUME_ID from RESUME re where re.RESUME_SFZH = KSXCGL_IDCARD)) xl from (select top ${currentPageSize} * from (select top(${pageNum}*${pageSize}) * from KSXCGL T where KSXCGL_DELFLAG=1 and (KSXCGL_KSCJ_GLG >=0 or KSXCGL_KSCJ_JSG >=0)
and KSXCGL_BKDW in (select ZZJG_DWMC from ZZJG where ZZJG_ID = #{zzjgDwdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or ZZJG_SJDW = #{zzjgDwdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and KSXCGL_NAME like '%${ksxcglName}%'
and KSXCGL_IDCARD like '%${ksxcglIdcard}%'
and KSXCGL_BKDW like '%${ksxcglBkdw}%'
and KSXCGL_KKSLX like '%${ksxcglKkslx}%'
and KSXCGL_KC like '%${ksxcglKc}%'
order by T.KSXCGL_ID desc ) as t1 order by KSXCGL_ID asc) as t2 order by KSXCGL_ID desc

select count(*) from KSXCGL where KSXCGL_DELFLAG=1 and (KSXCGL_KSCJ_GLG >=0 or KSXCGL_KSCJ_JSG >=0)
and KSXCGL_BKDW in (select ZZJG_DWMC from ZZJG where ZZJG_ID = #{zzjgDwdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and KSXCGL_NAME like '%${ksxcglName}%'

select KSXCGL_ID, KCGL_ID, KSXCGL_NAME, KSXCGL_IDCARD, KSXCGL_BKDW, KSXCGL_KKSLX, KSXCGL_WJQK,KSXCGL_BMGL_ID,KSXCGL_JSG_YYCJ, KSXCGL_TSZG, KSXCGL_KSCJ_GLG, KSXCGL_KSCJ_JSG, KSXCGL_YCSJ, KSXCGL_ADDTIME, KSXCGL_DELFLAG,KSXCGL_KC, KSXCGL_KSCJ_YYCJ,(select ZZJG_DWDM FROM ZZJG WHERE ZZJG_DWMC = KSXCGL_BKDW) DWDM, (KSXCGL_KSCJ_GLG+KSXCGL_KSCJ_YYCJ) glgcj,(KSXCGL_KSCJ_JSG+KSXCGL_JSG_YYCJ) jsgcj, (select RESUME_SEX from RESUME where RESUME_SFZH = KSXCGL_IDCARD) sex, (select RESUME_BIRTHDAY from RESUME where RESUME_SFZH = KSXCGL_IDCARD) birthday, (select kc.KCGL_NAME from KCGL kc where kc.KCGL_ID = t2.KCGL_ID) kcname, (Select CONVERT(VARCHAR(100), KSXCGL_ADDTIME, 20) ) kssj, (select top 1 RESUME_XXMC from RESUME_JYJL rj where rj.RESUME_ID = (select re.RESUME_ID from RESUME re where re.RESUME_SFZH = KSXCGL_IDCARD)) byyx, (select top 1 RESUME_ZYL from RESUME_JYJL rj where rj.RESUME_ID = (select re.RESUME_ID from RESUME re where re.RESUME_SFZH = KSXCGL_IDCARD)) zyl, (select top 1 RESUME_XL from RESUME_JYJL rj where rj.RESUME_ID = (select re.RESUME_ID from RESUME re where re.RESUME_SFZH = KSXCGL_IDCARD)) xl from (select top ${currentPageSize} * from (select top(${pageNum}*${pageSize}) * from KSXCGL T where KSXCGL_DELFLAG=1 and (KSXCGL_KSCJ_GLG >=0 or KSXCGL_KSCJ_JSG >=0)
and KSXCGL_BKDW in (select ZZJG_DWMC from ZZJG where ZZJG_ID = #{zzjgDwdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and KSXCGL_NAME like '%${ksxcglName}%'
and KSXCGL_IDCARD like '%${ksxcglIdcard}%'
and KSXCGL_BKDW like '%${ksxcglBkdw}%'
and KSXCGL_KKSLX like '%${ksxcglKkslx}%'
and KSXCGL_KC like '%${ksxcglKc}%'
order by T.KSXCGL_ID desc ) as t1 order by KSXCGL_ID asc) as t2 order by KSXCGL_ID desc

SELECT KSXCGL_ID, KCGL_ID, KSXCGL_NAME, KSXCGL_IDCARD, KSXCGL_BKDW, KSXCGL_KKSLX, KSXCGL_WJQK,KSXCGL_BMGL_ID,KSXCGL_JSG_YYCJ, KSXCGL_TSZG, KSXCGL_KSCJ_GLG, KSXCGL_KSCJ_JSG, KSXCGL_YCSJ, KSXCGL_ADDTIME, KSXCGL_DELFLAG,KSXCGL_KC, KSXCGL_KSCJ_YYCJ,(select ZZJG_DWDM FROM ZZJG WHERE ZZJG_DWMC = KSXCGL_BKDW) DWDM, (KSXCGL_KSCJ_GLG+KSXCGL_KSCJ_YYCJ) glgcj,(KSXCGL_KSCJ_JSG+KSXCGL_JSG_YYCJ) jsgcj, (select RESUME_SEX from RESUME where RESUME_SFZH = KSXCGL_IDCARD) sex, (select RESUME_BIRTHDAY from RESUME where RESUME_SFZH = KSXCGL_IDCARD) birthday, (select kc.KCGL_NAME from KCGL kc where kc.KCGL_ID = t2.KCGL_ID) kcname, (Select CONVERT(VARCHAR(100), KSXCGL_ADDTIME, 20) ) kssj, (select top 1 RESUME_XXMC from RESUME_JYJL rj where rj.RESUME_ID = (select re.RESUME_ID from RESUME re where re.RESUME_SFZH = KSXCGL_IDCARD)) byyx, (select top 1 RESUME_ZYL from RESUME_JYJL rj where rj.RESUME_ID = (select re.RESUME_ID from RESUME re where re.RESUME_SFZH = KSXCGL_IDCARD)) zyl, (select top 1 RESUME_XL from RESUME_JYJL rj where rj.RESUME_ID = (select re.RESUME_ID from RESUME re where re.RESUME_SFZH = KSXCGL_IDCARD)) xl FROM KSXCGL t2 where KSXCGL_BKDW = #{ksxcglBkdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (KSXCGL_KSCJ_GLG >=0 or KSXCGL_KSCJ_JSG >=0)
mapper.delete: delete from KSXCGL where KSXCGL_IDCARD = #{ksxcglIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and KSXCGL_KKSLX = #{ksxcglKkslx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and KSXCGL_KSCJ_GLG is null and KSXCGL_KSCJ_JSG is null and KSXCGL_KSCJ_YYCJ is null and KSXCGL_JSG_YYCJ is null
